titleStmt.title: A congratulatory poem to the Right Honourable Sir William Pritchard, Lord Mayor of the City of London

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby, at the Golden-Ball, near the Hospital-gate, in West-Smithfield,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "In that great train which loudly does reherse".
L Copy has annotation: 30. Octob. 1682.; stained at head.
Reproduction of the original in: British Library; Henry E. Huntington Library.
